TopicTitle: 14 ton Single Stage to Mun's Surface and Back (flight tutorial)

Articles.Content:
A few months back I made a series of "Knat" class Mini-SSTO's (craft thread with all 5 | Craft on KerbalX), most of which are just for quick (cheep) trips to LKO, but one of them had far greater range (unimaginatively called the RangerXL)

I meant to make this vid ages ago to show a Mun and back mission in the RangerXL and also to explain just how to fly the darn thing. It requires stupidly precise pitch control (like +/- 0.2 degrees) so you need MechJeb's SURF feature for that. Aside from that is all stock parts. Anyway here's the vid and a couple pics of the craft.
